description: This healthified recipe is perfect for those looking to indulge in a high-protein, high-fiber meal with a delightful twist. Combining the nuttiness of Adlai Rice with the freshness of tomatoes, okra, and capsicum, and the unique flavor of papaya relish, this dish is a hearty option for anyone seeking a nutritious yet delicious meal. Suited for a diet conscious about fibre and protein intake, this recipe promises a flavorful experience that doesn't compromise on health.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the ends off the okra and slice into rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the red onion and garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the chicken pieces until browned and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onion and garlic to the skillet and saut√© until soft, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Add the okra, tomatoes, and capsicum to the skillet and cook until they're softened, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the coconut amino over the mixture and add the papaya relish, stirring well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 11

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the beaten eggs over the skillet mixture, allowing the eggs to set without stirring, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 12

recipeInstructions.text: Gently fold the cooked Adlai Rice into the skillet, mixing well to ensure everything is evenly incorporated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 13
